creator: fredrik.bengtsson@lemontree.se
text:
Created attachment 26923
Minimal sample

It seems that when the very first content in a flow is a block with break-before="odd-page", an empty page is inserted properly when necessary but it does NOT use a blank-or-not-blank="blank" master reference when there is one - instead the odd-or-even="even" one is used.

Odd-page breaks work perfectly within flows, just not when they appear as the very first thing in a flow.

See attached minimal example which should illustrate the issue perfectly.
resetting P2 open bugs to P3 pending further review
creator: gadams@apache.org

text: please provide output PDF file that corresponds to the supplied input file; also provide any console output
